entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -36.5°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
